Class BaseGame

The base all games inherit from. Implements IBaseGame.

Inheritance
System.Object
BaseGame
ChannelGame
PetGame
Implements
IBaseGame
Namespace: PacManBot.Games
Assembly: Pacman.dll
Syntax
public abstract class BaseGame : object, IBaseGame

GetRequestOptions()

Creates a to be used in Discord tasks related to this game, such as message editions. Tasks with these options can be cancelled using CancelRequests().
